title: Al Sahla Al Shamaliya
text:
Al Sahla Al Shamaliya () is a village in <a href="Qatar">Qatar</a> located in the <a href="municipalities%20of%20Qatar">municipality</a> of <a href="Al-Shahaniya">Al-Shahaniya</a>.
Etymology.
According to the Ministry of Municipality and Environment, the first part of its name, "sahla" (also spelled "sahala") roughly means "vast, expansive plain" in <a href="Arabic%20language">Arabic</a>. The second part of its name, "shamaliya", translates to "northern"; this part denotes its northerly position relative to another area of the same name.
Geography.
The village of <a href="Umm%20Al%20Zubar%20Al%20Qibliya">Umm Al Zubar Al Qibliya</a> is nearby to the east while the village of <a href="Umm%20Wishah">Umm Wishah</a> is to the west.
